title: S14 Ep65: Supernatural News/Parashare: Head, Shoulders, Legs & Parts Edition

description:
Bizarre news on BEYOND the DARKNESS plus Supernatural News & we share YOUR Paranormal Stories.

Amazon is reuniting Simon Pegg and Nick Frost for a Ghost Hunting Parody, Aliens may be flashing us, but not like you think, and an Arizona Body Donation Facility has a brand new use for all those bodies donated for "science"!

All that and more today on the Best in Paranormal Talk Radio.

PLUS: There is an all new Darkness Radio app for IOS and IPhone! Check the app store by searching "Darkness Radio" and looking for the picture of "Skully"! Best of all, it's free!

Support our sponsors for great deals!
